medical_history.chief_complaint: Malignant transformation of a sessile osteochondroma in the left iliopubic region.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was first identified with multiple hereditary exostoses (MHE) at the age of twenty-six. The symptoms have progressed to include a malignant transformation in the last few years, with the current presentation noted at age thirty-two.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Multiple hereditary exostoses (MHE) since age twenty-six.
medical_history.family_history: The patientâ€™s mother (fifty-three years old) and deceased grandfather both had a similar clinical presentation of MHE but without malignant transformation.
